doc.title: Hood
doc.plot: Stone, a seasoned hit-man, wants to retire. He has had enough of the violence and the brutality and wants out of the merciless firm he works for. The bungled killing of a young woman further convinces the veteran that it is time for him to leave. The only way out, however, is to find a replacement. Stone looks to a young, brutal and reckless enforcer - Don. Sadistic, violent and merciless, is Don cut out to be a cold-blooded killer? He certainly seems to think so. Over the course of a day's work, Stone must prepare the young upstart for the ultimate test - to kill another human being in cold-blood. Does he have what it takes to make it in the big time or is Don destined always to be nothing more than a cheap hood? Find out...
